title: Menu Intent Schema
description: Schema for defining menu items and their relationships in the Intent Graph

id.description: Unique identifier for the menu item

label.description: Display label for the menu item

intent.description: Intent type this menu item triggers

parentId.description: Parent menu item ID for hierarchical menus

order.description: Display order within parent or root level

enabled.description: Whether the menu item is currently enabled

visible.description: Whether the menu item is currently visible

context.description: Contexts where this menu item should appear

metadata.description: Additional metadata for the menu item
